alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Beaver; Butler (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:20PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BEAVER... SOUTHWESTERN BUTLER AND NORTH CENTRAL ALLEGHENY COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 919 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beaver, or over Monaca, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cranberry, Aliquippa, Beaver Falls, Monaca, Economy, Ambridge, New Brighton, Beaver, Baden, Rochester, Harmony Township, Industry, Patterson Township, Conway, Freedom, West Mayfield, Bridgewater, Patterson Heights, East Rochester, and Fallston. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 14 and 29. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 79. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 36 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
